SQL_STMT_U.val: select min(CSEC701_EXPIRY) from :1/CSEC where CSEC_ADMNO = :2 and CSEC_CLNTNO = :3 and CSEC701_TYPE = :4 and not(CSEC701_EXPIRY is null)
